column4: anyone can tell why i cant get into a directory that exist but when i run cd /directory it say No such file or directory

hello i am following a tutorial "https://help.ubuntu.com/community/CompilingEasyHowTo"  but i am stuck on the step where it say run the following command ./configure coz when i run it nothing happen.. some help?
try sudo cd into that must be owned by root or other user
